==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
Originally as {{och-l|又|(right) hand; again}} in the oracle bone script.

In bronze inscriptions, a {{zh-l|*口|mouth; speech}} component was added, perhaps with the intention of indicating the use of {{och-l|又|again}} is a phonetic loan. In other words, the current form is a {{Han compound|又|口|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s|nocap=1}}.
